Text: Yeah, thanks for this, but of course it's that almost that bites me in the butt! Nobody seems to have the third book in the Darkness Rising Series-The Rising. AAAAAAAAAaaaaiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii, been looking and looking. If anyone has it, please upload.
Do you have the short story she had up on her site and removed, called "Belonging?"  I can't find that one anywhere.  Thank you!
Oh rats! Thanks for pointing that out kristybradyen. I should have checked. I thought this was an older series and they were all published.
